title: Investigation on Micro-scale Deformation of Additively Manufactured Inconel 718: Role of Segregation on Melt-pool Boundaries
content: Inconel 718, a Ni-based superalloy, was prepared by powder laser bed fusion (P-LBF) additive manufacturing (AM) method. AM of the Inconel 718 is challenging, as this particular alloy possesses a higher melting point, as well as resistance to temperature, which induces ‘hot-cracking’. Thus, the selection of proper input parameters is essential, which was successfully achieved in this present study.
